feed.title: Zitnik Lab
feed.subtitle: Harvard Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Our Group is Joining the Kempner Institute

link.title: Our Group is Joining the Kempner Institute

entry.content: Excited to join Kempner’s inaugural cohort of associate faculty to advance Kempner’s mission of studying the intersection of natural and artificial intelligence.
entry.summary: Excited to join Kempner’s inaugural cohort of associate faculty to advance Kempner’s mission of studying the intersection of natural and artificial intelligence.

entry.title: Welcoming a New Postdoctoral Fellow
entry.content: An enthusiastic welcome to Shanghua Gao who is joining our group as a postdoctoral research fellow.
entry.summary: An enthusiastic welcome to Shanghua Gao who is joining our group as a postdoctoral research fellow.

entry.title: On Pretraining in Nature Machine Intelligence

link.title: On Pretraining in Nature Machine Intelligence

entry.content: Excited to share our new study on language model pretraining and general-purpose methods for biological sequences. Project website.
entry.summary: Excited to share our new study on language model pretraining and general-purpose methods for biological sequences. Project website.

entry.title: Congratulations to Ada and Michelle
entry.content: Congrats to PhD student Michelle on being selected as the 2023 Albert J. Ryan Fellow and also to participate in the Heidelberg Laureate Forum. Congratulations to PhD student Ada for being selected as the Kempner Institute Graduate Fellow!
entry.summary: Congrats to PhD student Michelle on being selected as the 2023 Albert J. Ryan Fellow and also to participate in the Heidelberg Laureate Forum. Congratulations to PhD student Ada for being selected as the Kempner Institute Graduate Fellow!

entry.title: Universal Domain Adaptation at ICML 2023
entry.content: New paper introducing the first model for closed-set and universal domain adaptation on time series accepted at ICML 2023. Raincoat addresses feature and label shifts and can detect private labels. Project website.
entry.summary: New paper introducing the first model for closed-set and universal domain adaptation on time series accepted at ICML 2023. Raincoat addresses feature and label shifts and can detect private labels. Project website.

entry.title: Welcoming a New Postdoctoral Fellow
entry.content: An enthusiastic welcome to Tianlong Chen, our newly appointed postdoctoral fellow.
entry.summary: An enthusiastic welcome to Tianlong Chen, our newly appointed postdoctoral fellow.

entry.title: Celebrating Achievements of Our Undergrads
entry.content: Undergraduate researchers Ziyuan, Nick, Yepeng, Jiali, Julia, and Marissa are moving onto their PhD research in Computer Science, Systems Biology, Neuroscience, and Biological & Medical Sciences at Harvard, MIT, Carnegie Mellon University, and UMass Lowell. We are excited for the bright future they created for themselves.
entry.summary: Undergraduate researchers Ziyuan, Nick, Yepeng, Jiali, Julia, and Marissa are moving onto their PhD research in Computer Science, Systems Biology, Neuroscience, and Biological & Medical Sciences at Harvard, MIT, Carnegie Mellon University, and UMass Lowell. We are excited for the bright future they created for themselves.

entry.title: New Study in Nature Machine Intelligence

link.title: New Study in Nature Machine Intelligence

entry.content: New paper in Nature Machine Intelligence introducing the blueprint for multimodal learning with graphs.
entry.summary: New paper in Nature Machine Intelligence introducing the blueprint for multimodal learning with graphs.

entry.title: Self-Driving Labs in Nature Machine Intelligence

link.title: Self-Driving Labs in Nature Machine Intelligence

entry.content: New paper with NASA in Nature Machine Intelligence on biological research and self-driving labs in deep space supported by artificial intelligence.
entry.summary: New paper with NASA in Nature Machine Intelligence on biological research and self-driving labs in deep space supported by artificial intelligence.

entry.title: Precision Health in Nature Machine Intelligence

link.title: Precision Health in Nature Machine Intelligence

entry.content: New paper with NASA in Nature Machine Intelligence on biomonitoring and precision health in deep space supported by artificial intelligence.
entry.summary: New paper with NASA in Nature Machine Intelligence on biomonitoring and precision health in deep space supported by artificial intelligence.
